                                  org.json.JSONObject data,
                                  java.lang.String[] params)
                           throws WebServiceException
        Sends data to the server AllIn
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        action - Action to complete the URL of the request
        data - Parameters passed in the request header
        params - Parameters that will be passed in the URL
        Returns:
        Returns the responseData object according to the server information
        Throws:
        WebServiceException - If the server is in trouble

      • makeRequestURL

        public static ResponseEntity makeRequestURL(android.content.Context context,
                                            java.lang.String urlString,
                                            RequestType requestType,
                                            org.json.JSONObject data,
                                            boolean withCache)
                                     throws WebServiceException
        Performs server request sending or receiving data
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        urlString - URL to make the request to the server
        requestType - Tells whether a GET or a POST type of request param arameters data that will be sent to the server
        data - Parameters passed in the request header
        withCache - Determine whether there is any connection problem that should be written to the cache for future synchronization
        Returns:
        Returns the responseData object according to the server information
        Throws:
        WebServiceException - If the server is in trouble
